about_us.title: Sobre Nosotros
about_us.description: Aprende sobre nuestra misión y equipo

hero.title: About
hero.description: We're a passionate team of digital innovators, strategists, and creators dedicated to helping businesses thrive in the digital age. Founded on the principle that every business deserves exceptional digital experiences.

story.title: Our
story.p1: Founded in 2020, GrowBrandi emerged from a simple belief: every business, regardless of size, deserves access to world-class digital solutions. What started as a small team of developers and designers has grown into a full-service digital agency serving clients worldwide.
story.p2: Our journey began when we noticed a gap in the market - businesses struggling to find partners who truly understood both technology and business strategy. We set out to bridge that gap by combining technical expertise with deep business acumen.

innovation.title: Innovation First
innovation.desc: We stay ahead of industry trends and emerging technologies to deliver cutting-edge solutions that give you a competitive advantage.

client.title: Client-Centric
client.desc: Your success is our success. We build long-term partnerships based on trust, transparency, and measurable results.

quality.title: Quality Driven
quality.desc: We maintain the highest standards of quality in every project, from concept to completion, ensuring pixel-perfect delivery.

team.title: Meet the
team.description: The brilliant minds behind GrowBrandi's success, dedicated to delivering excellence in every project.

heading.title: Our
heading.description: A proven methodology that ensures project success from initial concept to final delivery. Our systematic approach combines industry best practices with innovative thinking.

steps.title: Discovery & Strategy
steps.description: We start by understanding your business, goals, and challenges through comprehensive research and stakeholder interviews.

steps.title: Design & Prototyping
steps.description: Creating user-centric designs and interactive prototypes that visualize the final product before development begins.

steps.title: Development & Integration
steps.description: Building your solution using modern technologies with clean, maintainable code and industry best practices.

steps.title: Testing & Quality Assurance
steps.description: Rigorous testing across all platforms and scenarios to ensure flawless functionality and user experience.

steps.title: Launch & Optimization
steps.description: Seamless deployment with monitoring, analytics, and continuous optimization for peak performance.

heading.title: Case
heading.description: Real success stories from businesses that transformed their digital presence with GrowBrandi. See how we've helped companies achieve remarkable growth and success.

items.title: E-commerce Revolution for TechStore
items.challenge: TechStore needed a modern, scalable e-commerce platform to compete with industry giants.
items.solution: We built a custom React-based e-commerce platform with advanced search, AI recommendations, and seamless checkout.

items.title: Brand Transformation for HealthPlus
items.challenge: HealthPlus needed to modernize their brand identity and digital presence to attract younger demographics.
items.solution: Complete brand overhaul including new visual identity, messaging framework, and digital-first marketing strategy.

items.title: AI-Powered Analytics for DataCorp
items.challenge: DataCorp needed intelligent automation to process vast amounts of customer data for better insights.
items.solution: Custom AI platform with machine learning algorithms for predictive analytics and automated reporting.

heading.title: The Experts Behind
heading.description: Our diverse team of digital experts brings together decades of experience in development, design, marketing, and AI to deliver exceptional results for our clients.

cta.title: Ready to Work with
cta.description: Let's discuss your project and see how our expert team can help you achieve your digital goals. We're here to turn your vision into reality.

heading.title: Join Our
heading.description: Be part of a passionate team that's shaping the future of digital experiences. We're always looking for talented individuals who share our vision of excellence.

openings.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
openings.description: We're looking for an experienced full-stack developer to join our growing team and help build amazing digital experiences.

openings.title: UI/UX Designer
openings.description: Join our creative team to design beautiful, intuitive user experiences that delight our clients and their customers.

openings.title: Digital Marketing Specialist
openings.description: Help our clients grow their digital presence through strategic marketing campaigns and data-driven optimization.

heading.title: Latest
heading.description: Insights, tips, and industry trends from our team of digital experts. Stay informed about the latest in web development, design, and digital marketing.

posts.title: The Future of AI in Web Development
posts.excerpt: Exploring how artificial intelligence is revolutionizing the way we build and maintain websites.

posts.title: Design Systems That Scale
posts.excerpt: Best practices for creating design systems that grow with your business and maintain consistency.

posts.title: Digital Marketing Trends for 2025
posts.excerpt: Key trends and strategies that will dominate digital marketing in the coming year.

faq.a1: GrowBrandi combina conocimientos de datos inteligentes con experiencia creativa.
faq.a2: Los plazos varían. Sitios simples toman 4-6 semanas, apps complejas 12-16 semanas.
faq.a4: Nos especializamos en React, Next.js, Node.js, TypeScript y automatización inteligente.

contact_us.title: Contact Us
contact_us.intro: If you have questions or comments about this policy, you may email us at {{email}} or by post to:

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.text: Welcome to {{appName}} ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or engage with our digital services, including Brand Growth, Web Development, and UI/UX Design.

collect.title: 2. Information We Collect
collect.text: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you:

list.1: Request a consultation or project quote
list.2: Subscribe to our newsletter or marketing communications
list.3: Engage with our "Slogan Generator" or "Health Audit" tools
list.4: Contact us via email or our contact forms

collect.text_2: The personal information we collect may include names, email addresses, phone numbers, job titles, and specific business requirements relevant to your project.

use.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
use.text: We use personal information collected via our website for a variety of business purposes described below:

list.1: To provide and deliver the services you request (e.g., delivering audit reports, project proposals)
list.2: To communicate with you about your projects, appointments, and account updates
list.3: To send you marketing and promotional communications regarding our latest services and offers
list.4: To improve our website performance and user experience through analytics
list.5: To protect our services and legal rights

sharing.title: 4. Sharing Your Information
sharing.text: We do not sell your personal information. We only share information with your consent, to comply with laws, to provide you with services (e.g., sharing data with third-party advertising platforms like Meta or Google for your ad campaigns), or to fulfill business obligations.

security.title: 5. Security of Your Information
security.text: We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to help protect your personal information. While we have taken reasonable steps to secure the personal information you provide to us, please be aware that despite our efforts, no security measures are perfect or impenetrable, and no method of data transmission can be guaranteed against any interception or other type of misuse.

agreement.title: 1. Agreement to Terms
agreement.text: These Terms of Service constitute a legally binding agreement made between you, whether personally or on behalf of an entity ("you") and {{appName}} ("we," "us" or "our"), concerning your access to and use of the {{appName}} website and our digital agency services.

ip.title: 2. Intellectual Property Rights
ip.text: Unless otherwise indicated, the Site is our proprietary property. However, regarding client projects:

list.deliverables: Client Deliverables: Upon full payment, all final deliverables (e.g., website code, design assets, ad creatives) created specifically for the Client shall become the property of the Client.
list.tools: Agency Tools: {{appName}} retains all rights to its background technology, frameworks, pre-existing code, and methodologies used to create the deliverables.
list.portfolio: Portfolio Rights: We reserve the right to display completed projects in our portfolio and marketing materials unless a Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA) is signed.

engagement.title: 3. Service Engagement
engagement.text: By engaging our services (Web Development, UI/UX Design, Marketing, etc.), you agree that:

list.1: You will provide all necessary content, assets, and information required for the project in a timely manner.
list.2: Project timelines are estimates and may vary based on the scope of changes or delays in feedback.
list.3: Payment terms are defined in your specific project proposal or contract.

prohibited.title: 4. Prohibited Activities
prohibited.text: You may not access or use the Site for any purpose other than that for which we make the Site available. The Site may not be used in connection with any commercial endeavors except those that are specifically endorsed or approved by us.

liability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
liability.text: In no event will we or our directors, employees, or agents be liable to you or any third party for any direct, indirect, consequential, exemplary, incidental, special, or punitive damages, including lost profit, lost revenue, loss of data, or other damages arising from your use of the site or our services, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages.

governing.title: 6. Governing Law
governing.text: These Terms shall be governed by and defined following the laws of Bangladesh. {{appName}} and yourself irrevocably consent that the courts of Khulna, Bangladesh shall have exclusive jurisdiction to resolve any dispute which may arise in connection with these terms.

what_are.title: 1. What Are Cookies
what_are.text: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and to provide information to website owners.

how_use.title: 2. How We Use Cookies
how_use.text: We use cookies for several purposes:

list.essential: Essential Cookies: Required for the website to function properly
list.analytics: Analytics Cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website (e.g., Google Analytics)
list.functional: Functional Cookies: Remember your preferences and settings
list.marketing: Marketing Cookies: Used to track visitors and deliver personalized ads

strict.title: Strictly Necessary Cookies
strict.text: These cookies are essential for the website to function and cannot be switched off. They are usually set in response to actions you take such as setting privacy preferences or filling in forms.

performance.title: Performance Cookies
performance.text: These cookies collect information about how visitors use our website, such as which pages are visited most often. This data helps us improve how our website works.

functionality.title: Functionality Cookies
functionality.text: These cookies allow our website to remember choices you make and provide enhanced features and personal content.

targeting.title: Targeting Cookies
targeting.text: These cookies are used to deliver advertisements that are relevant to you and your interests. They may be used to limit the number of times you see an advertisement.

managing.title: 4. Managing Your Cookie Preferences
managing.text: You can control and manage cookies in several ways:

list.browser: Use your browser settings to accept or reject cookies
list.delete: Delete existing cookies from your browser
list.notify: Set your browser to notify you when cookies are being sent

managing.text_2: Please note that disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of our website.

contact.title: 5. Contact Us
contact.text: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at:

brand_growth.title: Brand Growth
brand_growth.description: Scale your business with high-performance ad campaigns on TikTok, Meta, and Google. We focus on measurable ROI and rapid growth.
process: Audit & Strategy - We analyze your current performance and market position to build a winning growth strategy.
Creative Development - Designing high-converting ad creatives (video/static) that stop the scroll.
Campaign Setup - Precision targeting and technical setup across ad platforms.
Launch & Optimize - Going live and continuously tweaking for lower CPA and higher ROI.
Scale - Increasing budget on winning campaigns to maximize revenue.
Reporting - Transparent weekly reports showing exactly where your money is going and what it's returning.

social_media_content.title: Social Media Content
social_media_content.description: Engage your audience with professional video editing and post creation. We create content that stops the scroll and drives action.
process: Content Strategy - Defining your content pillars, tone of voice, and visual style.
Ideation & Scripting - Generating viral ideas and writing compelling scripts.
Production/Editing - Professional editing with hooks, captions, and effects.
Review & Approval - You review the content and we make necessary revisions.
Scheduling & Posting - Optimizing posting times for maximum reach.
Performance Review - Analyzing metrics to improve future content.

ui_ux_design.title: UI/UX Design
ui_ux_design.description: Create stunning, user-friendly interfaces that enhance user experience and boost conversion rates with modern design principles.
process: Discovery - Understanding user needs and business goals.
Research - Competitor analysis and user personas.
Wireframing - Structuring the layout and flow.
Visual Design - Applying branding and high-fidelity styling.
Prototyping - Creating interactive mockups for testing.
Handoff - Delivering pixel-perfect assets to developers.

web_development.title: Web Development
web_development.description: Develop fast, secure, and scalable websites using Shopify and WordPress. We build platforms that sell.
process: Planning - Technical architecture and roadmap.
Design - UI/UX approval (if needed).
Development - Coding the frontend and backend.
Testing - QA for bugs, speed, and responsiveness.
Launch - Deployment to live server.
Support - Post-launch maintenance and updates.

virtual_assistance.title: Virtual Assistance
virtual_assistance.description: Delegate time-consuming tasks to our professional virtual assistants. Focus on growing your business while we handle the rest.
process: Onboarding - We learn your processes and preferences.
Task Delegation - You assign tasks via email or project management tool.
Execution - Your dedicated VA completes tasks efficiently.
Review - Regular check-ins to ensure quality and alignment.
Optimization - We suggest process improvements.
Scaling - Add more hours or VAs as needed.

customer_support.title: Customer Support
customer_support.description: Provide exceptional 24/7 support to your customers. Our trained team ensures high satisfaction and retention.
process: Knowledge Transfer - We learn your product, policies, and tone.
Setup - Configuring support channels and tools.
Go Live - Team starts handling inquiries.
Quality Assurance - Monitoring responses for accuracy and empathy.
Reporting - Weekly insights on ticket volume and issues.
Feedback Loop - Suggesting product improvements based on user feedback.
